frame.name: People_by_origin
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains words for individuals, i.e. humans, with respect to their <fen>Origin</fen>. The <fen>Origin</fen> is generally incorporated, but may occasionally be specified separately. The <fen>Person</fen> is conceived of as independent of other specific individuals with whom they have relationships and independent of their participation in any particular activity. They may have an <fen>Age</fen>, <fen>Descriptor</fen>, <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen>, or <fen>Ethnicity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Person">I</fex>'m a <fex name="Descriptor">proud</fex> <t>Brit</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Person</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life. In this frame, it is generally incorporated in the lexical item, but may be separately specified as in the following:
<ex><t>Foreigners</t> <fex name="Ori">from Japan</fex> get short shrift around here.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Person
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Person</fen> is the human being whose <fen>Origin</fen> is specified.</def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Person</fen> which is concieved of as persisting over time.
<ex>The <fex name="Pers_char">swarthy</fex> <t>Frenchman</t> appeared at his elbow, smiling.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Person</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Person</fen> has been alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Person</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Context_of_acquaintance
FE.definition:
<def-root>An expression indicating the context with which the <fen>Person</fen> is associated.
<ex>Would you believe it? That <t>Frenchman</t> <fex name="coa">from the subway</fex> is back again!</ex></def-root>
